INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Fetch folder name, mapping name, workflow name
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_FETCH_MAPPING_INFO

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT BOOK_EDITIONS.CLIPPER_BOOK_ID, BOOK_EDITIONS.BOOK_EDITION, BOOK_EDITIONS.SALES_REGION_ID, BOOK_EDITIONS.EDITION_NAME, BOOK_EDITIONS.FINAL_PROOF_DATE, BOOK_EDITIONS.PUBLISHED_DATE, BOOK_EDITIONS.SALES_CLOSE_DATE, BOOK_EDITIONS.LAST_MODIFIED FROM $$Prefix.BOOK_EDITIONS where BOOK_EDITIONS.LAST_MODIFIED > TO_TIMESTAMP ('$$last_bk_upd_date', 'YYYYDDMMHH24MISSFF')

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: md5(lkp_BOOK_NAME || lkp_FRONT_OFFICE || lkp_SALES_REGION_KEY || lkp_SALES_CLOSE_DATE_KEY || lkp_PROOF_DATE_KEY || lkp_SHIP_DATE_KEY || lkp_PUB_DATE_KEY)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: lkp_checksum

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: md5(EDITION_NAME || FRONT_OFFICE || SALES_CLOSE_DATE_KEY || PROOF_DATE_KEY || SHIP_DATE_KEY || PUB_DATE_KEY)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: checksum

GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Path for the data when none of the group conditions are satisfied.
GROUP.NAME: DEFAULT1
